text: The Vyara assembly constituency (વ્યારા વિધાનસભા બેઠક) is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Tapi district. This seat is reserved for member of scheduled tribes. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments, # Vyara Taluka ==Total Number of Voters== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/PCAC.pdf {| class="wikitable" |- ! title: Vyara (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
